Adventuring fishing pole

Adventuring fishing pole
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Tools
Value: 10
Keywords: Adventuring tool set
Fishing rod
Fishing tool
Search
Keyword: 		Fishing
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A fishing pole with Adventurers' Guild insignia. It feels great for catching fish in the wild.

The Adventuring fishing pole item is a loot item.

Requirement

  • At least Fishing lvl. 15.

Attributes

+12% Chest finding While doing Fishing.
+2% Double action While doing Fishing.
+9% Fine material finding While doing Fishing.
+3% Double rewards While doing Fishing.
+1 Bonus experience While doing Fishing.
+6% Find collectibles While doing Fishing.

Uses

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Payment
Mysterious Merchant 5

Sources

Chest Drops

Chest Name Quantity Chance
(Per Roll) 		Chance
(Per Chest)† 		Odds
Adventuring guild chest 1 1.250% 4.907% ~1 in 20

†Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Price
Mysterious Merchant 20
